title: Prices of the Cheap Seats: A Boxplot
question_text: Erin is a sportswriter who is planning an article on "Getting to a Game on a Budget".  She has researched how much it would cost to purchase the cheapest ticket at all $30\text{ parks}$ where professional baseball is played.  The data is displayed below. Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2016. All rights reserved. From the following, what would be the most reasonable estimate for the mean price of the cheap seats?
